Author: Iscariiot
Text: There’s a great graphic novel called “In Clothes called Fat” that you might respond to. It takes an hour or so to read and really nails in the point that people will be shitty no matter what size you are. And that losing weight doesn’t actually help anything.   Also you should dump your shithole bf, not adjust yourself for him. Men truly aren’t worth it.
